testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause. Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch.num = 1 AND ch.name = 'chapter 1' AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause, LIKE. Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`spans`) = 2 AND v.index_projection.entry_keys = [0,1,2,3,5] AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch.num IN [1,2] AND ch.name LIKE 'chapter %' AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause, OR. Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`spans`) = 2 AND v.index_projection.entry_keys = [0,2,3,5] AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch WHERE f.type = 'book' AND (ch.num = 1 OR ch.num = 2) AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause, AND, OR. Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`spans`) = 2 AND v.index_projection.entry_keys = [0,1,2,3,5] AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch.num >= 1 AND (ch.name = 'chapter 1' OR ch.name = 'chapter 2') AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause (addittional predicate). No Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch`.`name`') AND NOT CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch`.`xyz`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, ch.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch.num = 1 AND LOWER(ch.name) = 'chapter 1' AND ch.xyz IS MISSING AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause(different bindings). Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch1`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, ch1.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch1 WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch1.num = 1 AND ch1.name = 'chapter 1' AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause(LET,array bindings same). Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch1`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT META(f).id, ch1.description FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch1 LET ch = 5 WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch1.num = 1 AND ch1.name = 'chapter 1' AND f.isbn = 1 AND f.year = 2020

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause. Index Aggregation. ORDER, OFFSET, LIMIT, Cover. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND v.index_group_aggs IS NOT MISSING AND v.`limit` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`offset` IS NOT MISSING AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT ch1.num, COUNT(1) AS cnt, COUNT(DISTINCT ch1.name) AS dcnt FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch1 WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch1.num >= 1 AND f.isbn >= 1 GROUP BY ch1.num ORDER BY ch1.num DESC LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1

testcase: Flatten Array index with UNNEST clause. No Index ORDER. Explain

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND v.`covers` IS NOT MISSING AND v.spans[0].`range`[0].`low` IS NOT MISSING AND v.index_order IS MISSING AND CONTAINS(v.`filter`, '`ch1`.`num`') AND v.`index` = 'ixf10u' END

statements: SELECT ch1.num, META(f).id FROM flattenkeys AS f UNNEST f.chapters AS ch1 WHERE f.type = 'book' AND ch1.num >= 1 AND f.isbn <= 1 ORDER BY ch1.num DESC, f.isbn LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1
